org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks

Class ScriptableContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeExtendedObject
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks.ScriptableContext

  • @JsType(isNative=true,
        name="Object",
        namespace="<global>")
public final class ScriptableContext
extends NativeExtendedObject
    The option context is used to give contextual information when resolving options.
    The context object contains the following properties:
    • index(int): index of the associated data
    • datasetIndex(int): index of the associated dataset
    • active(boolean): if the data and dataset item is hovered. It also maps the hover property of CHART.js context.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
